Description: The Program Office will help provide overall timeline and resource management for successful Data Strategy delivery for [customer], including tracking and communications.

Title 3: Enable DSPO to Track Work Tasks
Description: As a Digital Advisor, I need to provide a way for the Customer to keep track of overall timeline and resource management for successful Data Strategy delivery within Azure DevOps
As a Digital Advisor, I need to create a process that will allow the Customer to monitor the current spending of their allotted budget

As a Digital Advisor, I need to work along the Customer to define the success metrics of a successful Data Strategy delivery and establish a sprint cadence that will manage the team and keep everyone aligned on reaching our goals
This epic captures a need for a Data Strategy to be defined to enable the realization of insights from data assets.

This feature describes the set of capabilities required to assist with defining the current Data Maturity. This feature is intended to help define the current data maturity so areas for discussion can be identified prior to, and during, the execution of the Data Strategy workshops.
This feature is composed of the following capabilities:
  • Define current data maturity through self-assessment
  • Produce the data maturity report to assist with the definition of the Data Strategy

As a Digital Advisor
I need to enable [Customer] to complete the data maturity assessment
So that the current Data Maturity can be defined and baselined prior to the Data Strategy workshops

This feature describes the set of capabilities required to assist with defining the Data Strategy. This feature is composed of the following capabilities:
  • Discover the current Data Capability landscape
  • Define Objectives and Key Results to assist with focusing the Data Strategy outcomes
  • Assess People, Process and Change Management required to enable the Data Strategy outcomes

As a Data Architect
I need to discover the current data capability landscape
So that I can assess the shared data services capabilities required to enable the Data Strategy and support use-case delivery

As a Digital Advisor
I need to assist Customer in defining their Objectives and Key Results
So that a coherent Data Strategy can be defined

As a Digital Advisor, I need to assess the Customer's existing Data Governance and Operations Maturity and consider which Adoption and Change Management elements are needed for data-driven organizational readiness
This Epic creates Jump-Start Kit tools that allow EDS to focus on business outcomes and to demonstrate the value back to the organization.

This feature provides a set of artefacts which will encompass a Data Lake capability to support the Data Strategy. This is captured in the following capabilities:
  • Configuration of zones within the Data Lake repository
  • Design and implementation of security and access boundaries around the Data Lake
  • Implementation of a hierarchical namespace structure to map to the logical zones
  • Provisioning of JumpStart Deployment artefacts realised as Infrastructure-as-Code and PowerShell
  • Configuration of telemetry, monitoring and alerting functionality

Title 3: Design Data Lake zones required for Data Lake
Description:
As a Data Engineer
I need to produce a design of the Data Lake comprising the different zones 
So that I can enable format-agnostic data sources to be ingested, persisted and used within the JumpStart Data Lake

Title 3: Design of initial security and access boundaries around the Data Lake
Description:
As a Data Engineer
I need to produce a design of security and access boundaries around the Data Lake 
So that I can ensure that data sources are persisted and protected.

Implementation Guidance:
  • Identify the personas who will use the Data Lake and detail interactions
  • Detail process interactions between access boundaries for the Data Lake

Title 3: Implement Hierarchical Namespace structure for Data Lake
Description:
As a Data Engineer
I need to produce a Hierarchical Namespace structure 
So that I can enable the creation of filesystems / folders within the Data Lake

Title 3: Configure and provision JumpStart deployment artifacts
Description:
As a Data Engineer
I need to configure and provision the JumpStart Data Lake deployment artifacts 
So that I can implement the Data Lake required for the Data Strategy

Title 3: Define Azure AD groups aligned to Data Lake HNS structure
Description:
As a Data Engineer
I need to create and assign the Azure AD groups aligned to the FileSystems and Folder structures defined in the Data Lake Access Model 
So that access to the Data Lake is secured and defined.

Title 3: Define and grant access to the Data Lake
Description:
As a Data Engineer
I need to secure the access to the shared Data Lake
So that systems and users have the right level of permissions only to the data they need
This Feature eliminates the need for staging and allows publishers to publish data into the Data Lakes supporting multiple fabrics.
As a Data Engineer, I need to create a Data Gateway that will allow me to securely ingest the Customer's on-premise data

As a Data Engineer, I need to create ADF Pipelines utilizing Azure Integration Runtime to connect to the On-Prem data through the Data Gateway and orchestrate the data into the Raw Landing Zone in my Data Lake

This feature provides a set of artefacts which will encompass a Data Catalog service to support the Data Strategy. This is captured in the following capabilities:
  • Identification of data sources to govern
  • Provision Azure Purview service
  • Configure data sources for metadata collection
  • Register Data Orchestrator with Azure Purview
As a Data Engineer, I need to provision an Azure Purview service as a Central Data Management Tool that allows the customer to gain insights into their metadata stored in the Data Lakes

As a Data Engineer
I need to identify data sources to catalog
So that I can enable the data assets to be governed by the Data Strategy

Title 3: Configure data sources for metadata collection
Description:
As a Data Engineer
I need to configure data sources for metadata collection
So that I can enable a data catalog repository to be created and utilized by the Data Strategy implementation

Title 3: Register data orchestrator with Azure Purview
Description:
As a Data Engineer 
I need to register the data orchestrator with Azure Purview
So that metadata can be captured to enable data lineage within the Data Strategy

This feature provides a set of artefacts which will encompass the Handshaking service to support the Data Strategy. The Handshaking service provides self-service data ingestion and orchestration functionality. This is captured in the following capabilities:

This feature provides a set of artefacts which will encompass a Data Lake capability to support the Data Strategy. This is captured in the following capabilities:
  • Deployment / configuration of Handshaking artifacts to Azure DevOps
  • Provisioning of JumpStart Handshaking Azure artifacts realised as Infrastructure-as-Code and PowerShell
As a Data Engineer, I need to create Data Factory 'Work Items' that will indicate the source data to ingest into our Data Lake landing zone
As a Data Engineer, I need to create automated pipelines that will trigger when a Data Factory 'Work Item' is created.
As a Data Engineer, I need to create a database that will store metadata from the Data Factory 'Work Item'
This Feature allows Data Engineers to bring compute into the Data Lakes by reading the JSON files to understand the metadata, and then read the data files
As a Date Engineer, I need to work with the Customer to identify which source schemas we should keep track of to update for any changes
As a Data Engineer, I need to automate a process to check whether an asset's schema has been changed and if it has, create a new versioned JSON metadata file associated with the data

This feature describes a set of capabilities required to assist with assessing and implementing Data Governance as part of the Data Strategy. This feature is composed of the following capabilities:
  • Identification of Data Governance capabilities required to enable the Data Strategy including data lineage, cataloging, and discovery
  • Defining Data Lifecycle management 
  • Determining Data Security approaches (anonymisation, redaction, masking)
  • Creating Data Access policies
This epic captures the need for data migration and visualization to be performed as part of the Data Strategy definition and implementation
This feature describes the capabilities required to enable visualization of data insights gained as part of the Data Strategy implementation
This feature captures the capabilities required to perform Data Migration assessment activities as part of the Data Strategy implementation
